data.name: Tip1
data.value: Protect your notes securely with password settings.

data.name: Tip2
data.value: Save to your notes immediately after capture to record precious ideas.

data.value: Paste images and content from external pages to use the smart system for permanent low-storage storage.

data.name: Tip4
data.value: Connect cloud folders like N-Drive or Google Drive to share My Notes on any computer.

data.name: Tip5
data.value: Use tags to quickly find what you want among numerous notes.

data.name: Tip7

data.value: Double-click images in posts to edit them.
